title: Visualización Molecular de la Sinergia de la Cúrcuma

versions.basePromptText: A hyper-realistic 3D molecular visualization of curcumin and piperine molecules interacting. The scene should be cinematic, with dramatic lighting highlighting the synergistic bond between the compounds. The background should be a dark, abstract representation of cellular structures.
versions.fullPromptText: A hyper-realistic 3D molecular visualization of curcumin and piperine molecules interacting. The scene should be cinematic, with dramatic lighting highlighting the synergistic bond between the compounds. The background should be a dark, abstract representation of cellular structures, aspect ratio 16:9, photorealistic, 8k, ultra-high detail, sharp focus
